If the character is released outside of a panel or if any character falls down a gap, it dies immediately but restarts from the beginning.

Next to merely completing a level, it is possible to finish it in a better way by collecting all hearts along the way. There is also a perfect way to complete a level by collecting all hearts without dying once. Levels are unlocked one after another, but by perfecting them it is possible to reveal some earlier.

157758.Name: Jetpack Joyride
157758.Overview: Barry Steakfries works as salesman for a gramophone-making company, but the business is about to go bust, due to low sales. One day, as he walks on a street, down because of the sales, he finds one of "top secret" laboratories of Legitimate Research, and sees the Machinegun jetpack inside. Dreaming of using the jetpack to do good, Barry bursts through the wall of the laboratory and steals the experimental jetpack from the clutches of the scientists, thus beginning the game.

AltNames.Name: フラッシュモーター・カレン

157764.Name: Flash Motor Karen
157764.Overview:
Flash Motor Karen is divided into puzzle mode and story mode.

Puzzle mode is for puzzle levels only.

In story mode if you clear one area more than 5 stages, a new story will be added to the story mode. 
The story mode is the flow of ADV → puzzle → ADV → .... 
When one story is over, a new area is added to the puzzle mode.

The game progresses by alternately clearing the two modes.

157765.Name: Gamocracy One: Legend of Robo7
157765.Overview:
Legend of Robot is something very special. It is the product of the Gamocracy project, in which The Bearded Ladies invited the PlayStation® community forum members to design a game. The result is an awesome platformer with some very unique game mechanics and colorful characters.
In true Gamocracy spirit here is the salespitch from one of the forum members : 
Have you ever considered what it’d be like to throw your own head off and use it as a platform or weapon? How about turning your arms into energy canons and magnets? In Legend of Robot you can do all of these things! 
It’s evident that some of you DO think about these things, because you– the best and brightest of the community, designed it! 
- Vincent Pavey

157766.Name: Golf Mania
157766.Overview:
Golf Mania features over 90 holes of golfing mayhem that is easy to learn but tough to master. 

With single and multiplayer gaming on classic grass courses and modern courses built upon incredible gravity defying glass towers, Golf Mania offers hours of gameplay for the whole family.

157900.Name: Vempire
157900.Overview:
Help a young vampire become the king of the monster land. Defeat the other monster lords and conquer their lands. VEMPIRE is a puzzle game in which you have to rotate blocks to create rows or columns of 4 of more blocks of the same type. Delete enough blocks before the time runs out to complete a level. Blocks can be of various types. Some are meaningless blocks; others represent mana energy of different colors or money. Money collected during the game can be spent in the shop to buy new creatures to summon during the game. Doing mana combos the player can summon creatures that will help the player delete the blocks or tackle the big bosses. The game features 6 different creatures. 

In the 40 game levels you will be able to unlock artefacts. These artefacts give you various powers, like slowing down time or turning the blocks into mana. 

Each game world is owned by a boss monster. This monster will appear every once in a while and will cast a nasty spell against you making the game harder. 

VEMPIRE © 2009 developed and published by Impressionware Srl.

157901.Name: Tiny Hawk
157901.Overview: Tiny Hawk is a 2D platform game with simple controls and fast arcade feel, where the player must collect the higher number of soda cans in the shortest possible time. The difficulty comes with the impossibility to stop: player is only able to turn and jump.

157902.Name: Telegraph Sudoku & Kakuro
157902.Overview:
Play number-puzzles from the 'Telegraph' like you've never played them before! Discover a whopping 500 puzzles of multiple types. You're in for many hours of game play!

• Sudoku: Classic 9x9 Sudoku grids in 4 levels of difficulty.
• Mini-Sudoku: Easier 6x6 grids.
• Sudoku-X: 9x9 grids in which the diagonals must also be filled with all numbers from 1 to 9.
• Jigsaw Sudoku: 9x9 grids with uncommon box shapes.
• Kakuro: With its handy interface and intuitive controls, this game transfigures the classic pen-and-paper experience.

157903.Name: Telegraph Crosswords
157903.Overview:
Play crossword puzzles from the 'Telegraph' like you've never played them before!

Discover a whopping 500 puzzles of multiple types. You're in for many hours of gameplay!

With its handy interface and intuitive controls, this game transfigures the classic pen-and-paper experience.

Notable features include:

• A huge selection of quick puzzles, cryptic puzzles and general knowledge puzzles!• Registration of best times in the Hall of Fame.• Interactive hints prevent you from being stuck!• Auto-save as you go: you can stop and resume a puzzle at any time!

157905.Name: Sweet Reversi
157905.Overview: Outsmart your friends and take all of their macaroons for yourself in this tasty take on the reversi game. Stay on your toes, strategize and make sure you are always thinking several steps ahead as you trap your opponent’s macaroons and turn them into yours in this deliciously fun puzzle game.

157906.Name: Swap Zap
157906.Overview:
Pam can run and jump around in an increasingly hazardous space-truck, dodging falling blocks and dangers that slowly fill the cargo holds.
Enemies pop out of the space-trucks nooks and corners to gnaw at our heroine.

As if that wasn´t enough Pam needs to collect all power cores in each level in order to start her ship.

The only tool available to her is the Swap-Zapper which enables its user to change places with anything it zaps!

With this tool Pam can instantly climb to high places, teleport blocks to crush enemies, zap away ticking time bombs and switch places with sharp cargo falling straight for her.

Each level of the game takes place in a cargo container of the huge space truck.

The objective of each level is to collect all the power cores needed to open the airlock into the next hold, effectively shrinking the distance between Pam and the control room of the spacecraft.

157907.Name: Super Fruitfall Deluxe
157907.Overview:
Move your fruit around the grid, group them together and watch as they disappear from your screen.

Organise your fruits into straight lines or cunningly stack them on top of each other to clear more than one fruit type and earn big bonuses.

Take on level after level of fruity puzzle action within the time limit.

157909.Name: Star Hammer Tactics
157909.Overview:
When Novus falls, will you be its saviour? Take command of the infamous NSG-14 as Lieutenant Fredan Dyce in Campaign mode, or battle your friends for supremacy in 'hotseat' Skirmish mode.

With every ship of Naval Strike Group 14 under your direct command, launch missiles to annihilate your enemies from afar or close in for explosive ship-to-alien broadsides. 

* Engaging turn-based tactical battles : individually control each ship in your fleet 
* Easy-to-learn rules; learn to play in minutes! 
* OPERATION STAR HAMMER : In this epic Campaign, play as Lieutenant Fredan Dyce, earn promotions within the Alliance Navy and come face-to-face with the single greatest threat to the safety of your homeworld, Novus. 
* Skirmish modes : create your own custom fleet, then duel against a friend in "hotseat" multiplayer, or take on the challenging AI

157910.Name: Stand O'Food
157910.Overview: Stand O'Food is a fastfood restaurant simulator with where you need to cook up veggie, omelet, beef, chicken or fish burgers, before the long line of impatient customers becomes too big. If you earn money for each session, you can upgrade your restaurant with music, dressings, faster cooking, and other improvements. This is a fast, instant play game with more than 100 levels and 80 different burger recipes.

157912.Name: Snowy: The Bear's Adventures
157912.Overview: Help the white bear Snowy to get to Arctic. Could it be possible for a little white bear to withstand a whole army of evil monsters? For sure, if we’re talking about charming and fearless Snowy. Armed to the teeth with the snowballs, he is turning his enemies into large balls of snow and ice figures. But this snowballs throwing champion doesn’t want to do any harm, he simply wants to get back home to Arctic and collect as many prizes and bonuses on his way as possible. And he will make it! But only with your help. Attention: During the game play, more then 10000 snowballs will be made. All of the monsters will be defrosted afterwards. No white bears will get hurt.

157913.Name: Snake Warriors: Training
157913.Overview:
Choose from nine characters and start your career as a Snake Master in Snake Warriors: Training. Show your talent as a driver at the race tracks in Snake Race and demonstrate your patience and skill in avoiding hitting your own body in Classic Training. But are you sure you can also do this in the dark in Night Training? 

If you possess all these skills, then show you have an excellent memory in the Snake Memory game, but beware: in some levels you will even need to combine all your talents with numerical skills. If you turn out to be good at all these games and you have also mastered picking up moving items in Hunting Targets, you will be heading for a successful career in which you can unlock many pieces of clothing for your snake as well as medals throughout the 75 levels. 

Specifications: 
- 75 levels
- 5 games
- 9 characters
- 3 save slots

157919.Name: Smashbreak
157919.Overview: Use paddles on either side of the screen to deflect balls and break the blocks in the middle. Collect power-ups and use your SMASH ability to send the ball flying and break multiple blocks at once. Two-player mode lets two people play on a single PS3™ system or PSP® system to play head to head.

157920.Name: Shift: Extended
157920.Overview:
SHIFT is a successful game that has already puzzled the mind of over 14 million players around the world. It is now finally coming to the PlayStation®3 and the PSP™ in a new 'extended' version with new levels and gameplay mechanics.

As a subject of a science experiment, you have to escape the 120 levels of the game and avoid all the carefully crafted traps. Fortunately you have a unique power called 'SHIFT': floor, ceiling, walls...everything is reversed by pressing a single button!

Will you be able to get out alive of this experiment?
Be extra careful as the number of traps doubled in this version!

157921.Name: Sheep Defense
157921.Overview:
Hungry bears and crazy wolves are after your flock of soft, fluffy sheep and it’s up to you and a friend to control two brave, valiant sheep dogs and protect the herd. Howl, bark or even unleash a super powered growl to scare away ferocious invaders. But bark too much and your stamina may decrease leaving you temporarily powerless to protect your cute cuddly friends. 

Recommended for two players and playable on a single PSP® system only.

157922.Name: Shapo
157922.Overview:
Shapo is a challenge that will keep you on the edge!

Shapo is a challenge that will keep you on the edge! Balance the scales as you place shapes made of different materials. Play more than 150 levels in Classic or Puzzle mode to unlock the greatest wonders of the world. Stunning art brings 15 wonders of the world to life! Enjoy exciting power ups such as the material bomb and line bomb. Each ball and shape has a different weight so be careful when placing your pieces!

*Classic Mode: Create lines to remove balls. Match sequential lines and watch the combo multiplier grow!

*Puzzle Mode: Complete increasingly complicated levels by filling the grid with the given balls.

157923.Name: Run Ghost Run
157923.Overview: An infernal storm begins and you think that an old castle could be your salvation. You will soon discover that this is one of the worst decisions you have ever made. The doors close and you begin to try and find a way out, but what you don’t know is that you will never be alone. Shoot, jump, run and try to avoid the hundreds of ghosts who never want you to leave. Enjoy 36 levels and 2 game modes of this fun and super addictive adventure. The longest night of your life has just begun...

157924.Name: Ronnie O'Sullivan's Snooker
157924.Overview:
Here with Ronnie O'Sullivan's Snooker, you play through the highlights of Ronnie's career culminating in his most famous World Championship wins. Have you got what it takes to re-create his many stunning victories?

Ronnie guides you through the game, giving advice, even taking you back to his home table where you can refine your skills in his very own practice room.

Memory Stick Duo™ Compatible: 2MB

Download of this product is subject to the Sony Entertainment Network Terms of Service/User Agreement and any specific additional conditions applying to this product. If you do not wish to accept these terms, do not download this product. See Terms of Service for more important information.

One time fee for use of downloads on up to 2 activated compatible Home Console systems and 3 activated compatible Portable Console systems.
See Health Warnings for important health information before using this product.

Library programs ©Sony Computer Entertainment Inc. exclusively licensed to Sony Computer Entertainment Europe. Software Usage Terms apply, See eu.playstation.com/legal for full usage rights.

Ronnie O'Sullivan and his name, likeness, image & biographical data have been used under license from Ronnie O'Sullivan. The use of the names or images of any other snooker players, events, organizations, tournaments or venues within this game are intended as factual biographical references only and this game is NOT endorsed by such third parties.

157925.Name: Retro Cave Flyer
157925.Overview:
Guide your landing craft through 23 challenging levels, solving puzzles and avoiding hazards whilst finding and saving the stranded scientists. Get them all back to the mothership before the planet goes super nova. Great gameplay, perfect physics, vibrant visuals and a storming soundtrack make this the best lunar lander arcade puzzler available. 

All game code, art, design © Big Head Games Ltd. 2010 Music: Stage One composed by Space Manoeuvres, © 1999 Hooj Choons. All rights reserved. 

Purchase or use of this item is subject to the PlayStation®Network Terms of Service and User Agreement. If you do not wish to accept all these terms, do not purchase or use this item. This item has been sublicensed to you by Sony Computer Entertainment America. One-time license fee for downloads to up to 2 console systems and 2 portable systems that are associated with the purchasing account.

157926.Name: Red Bull X-Fighters
157926.Overview: With Red Bull X-Fighters, gamers around the world can now experience the thrill and excitement of the best Freestyle Motocross riders in the world on Xbox LIVE Arcade and PC. The game puts you, the player, on centre stage of the Red Bull X-Fighters World Tour. Take your bike, launch from huge ramps and pull off truly stunning and jaw-dropping tricks while up to 40 feet in the air. Do you have what it takes to wow the crowd and pull out all stops in the attempt to finish as overall champion? But don’t expect this to be an easy challenge. You’ve got to master the right level of acceleration and braking, balance your body and all the while performing death-defying maneuvers on 100-foot leaps - don’t crash or it will ruin your run.

157927.Name: Ramen Heaven
157927.Overview:
Slurp up the fun in the quirky PSP® soup game Ramen Heaven. Use your chopsticks to collect bubbles of oil floating on the soup, and place them in your spoon to eat up, increasing your satisfaction gauge. A bowl of ramen has never had so many obstacles in it, knock into an egg and your oil bubble will split up, braise a naruto, and it may pop altogether. Heat up the fun by grabbing a friend and competing head to head! 

Recommended for one or two players and playable using a single PSP® system.

157928.Name: Quiz Animania
157928.Overview:
Can you correctly identify a duck by only looking at a zoomed in picture of its bill? How about spotting an rhino by just by a flashing image of its rump? Quiz Animania is a lighthearted game that will challenge your knowledge of the animal kingdom. Animal lovers will have their wits tested as they race to identify animals before time runs out. For big bonuses look for chance questions that could be your shot to earn loads of points and come back from behind to beat your friends. Play solo in the certification mode or head-to-head with a friend. Good Luck!

Recommended for two players and playable using a single PSP® system.

157929.Name: Pinball Duel
157929.Overview: Face off against the computer or a friend in the crazy frenetic world of double sided Pinball Duel. With two balls being catapulted around the pinball arena, nail the timing and use your flippers to smack them at just the right angle. Tag the bonus target marks to win big prizes, unleash more balls and work to reach the coveted 10,000 point mark. Trying to catch up, but running out of luck, be devious and tilt the board to gain an advantage!

157930.Name: Pile Up! Bakery
157930.Overview: Can you make a mountain out of sweets and candies? Drop cakes, pies, and more from your assembly line and pile them up to the sky! You are up against the clock so you need to place each sweet in just the right spot to help build your tower of treats as high as possible. Things start simple but you will soon find it's not quite as easy as taking candy from a baby.

157931.Name: Phase Shift: Threats Beyond the Network
157931.Overview:
Phase Shift follows the story of Xargis, a genius programmer fighting against cyber terrorism in the future.

Defeat your enemies and protect The Network!

Visually represented as a “Ship Battle”, Phase Shift presents a unique 2D Arcade Shooter game with a warp mechanic, providing a vibrant and dynamic game-play.

157932.Name: Pachisi
157932.Overview: The game is played on a board shaped like a symmetrical cross. The big square in the center of the board called as “Charkoni” is the starting and finishing position of the gotis or pawns. Player's objective is to move all the gotis around the board and then back to charkoni before other player does the same. A players' pieces move around the board based upon the outcome of the 'Passa', a rectangular dice used as an element of chance.

157933.Name: Pac-Man: Championship Edition
157933.Overview:
Pac-Man: Championship Edition is a sequel, by the same developer Tōru Iwatani, done in the style of the original classic. As before, you are Pac-Man and you are in a maze with dots, power pellets and hosts. The object is to eat the dots and avoid the ghosts, unless you eat a power pellet, which gives you the ability to eat the ghosts for a few seconds.

What's new here is many different mazes and modes. This is designed from the ground up as a console game, so some arcade traditions are lost. The object is no longer to try to survive/get a high score without losing quarters, but to get a high score in a set time limit. You do still have a set number of lives, which makes your time end early if you lose all them.

Unlike the original or its prodigy, Championship Edition isn't broken into distinct levels. Once you clear one side of the maze, a fruit appears on the other side. Eating the fruit regenerates the empty half with new walls, dots, power pellets, etc and increases the game speed.

The iPhone version of the game adds two additional modes. In "Mission Mode", you must clear a specific goal set by the game at the beginning of play (such as eating two apples, or eating eight ghosts consecutively). In "Challenge Mode", you must aim to achieve the top score for each course, but this time the ghosts have been sped up so that they are initially much faster.

The look is a bright neon which evokes the classic Pac-Man but takes advantage of nearly 30 years of increased computer power.

157934.Name: One Two Boat Racing
157934.Overview: Welcome to the wet wild world of One Two Boat Racing, where you need to use your reflexes and speed to stay in the lead, beat the competition, and be the first to reach the finish line. But there is more to winning than just speed. You'll need to evade pylons, blow by rocks, and make sure to avoid sludge or face wasting precious seconds and losing the race.

157935.Name: Normal Tanks
157935.Overview:
NormalTanks is a fast-paced multi-directional top-down arcade shooter featuring classic run'n'gun gameplay with 3 difficulty settings. At the 8 challenging, dynamic and hazardous environments, inside the enemy bases or forests and mountains, you have to choose your battle tactics carefully to survive! 

Over the 30 dangerous enemies types on your heroic way, including various tanks, machines and helicopters, robots and biomechanical creatures, pillboxes and missile sites. Crash, kill and destroy them all to move forward and with help of the red star power-ups, which upgrades your tank abilities: cannon, machine gun, shield and speed. 

Some levels transform you to tiny mine-bot to stealth pass near the enemies and deactivate energy fields or to giant walking robot, which demolish everything on his way to the alien's hive! 

Try to finish the game without lost any life and save the universe the classic, old school arcade way!

157936.Name: Nocturnal: Boston Nightfall
157936.Overview:
Claire is lying on a back alley, bleeding and dying from a mysterious attack. As she is about to pass away, a vampire comes to the rescue by making her into one of his kind. Now Claire has to stalk the streets of Boston, searching for her murderer while fighting to stay as human as possible.

Nocturnal: Boston Nightfall is a standard hidden object game with mini-games between chapters. The main objective is to find all the objects listed at the bottom of the screen, on locations cluttered with scattered and assorted paraphernalia, within a time limit. Wrong clicks take away six seconds from the clock. The timer can be turned off at the main menu.

One of three mini-games appears after each level: a concentration game with cards, a Simon game with orbs and a Master Mind lock-picking game. Some of these games can be played over again to get extra hints. The hint button highlights the position of one of the objects.

157937.Name: The Next Space
157937.Overview: Pilot a spaceship, collect various speed and weapon items to take down a multitude of enemies, and restore peace to the galaxy in this vertical scrolling shooter released by SNK in 1989.

157938.Name: The Mystery of the Crystal Portal
157938.Overview:
Journalist Nicole Rankvist receives a letter from Robert, her archaeologist father, describing the discovery of the key for a powerful artifact called the Crystal Portal. When he goes missing, Nicole must find the scattered pieces of the key around the world.

The Mystery of the Crystal Portal is a hidden object that replaces the traditional list of objects names with a different gameplay mechanic. The player has to click on certain objects in the scenery that open a circle around it with photographs of items that must be found and dragged to it. After picking all the required stuff, some of these container objects disappear to reveal a key item underneath them.

Some of the objects have to be collected in one screen to be used in another place (for example, finding matches outside the house to light a fireplace inside). At the end of each stage/location there's a unique logic puzzle game to be solved, involving some of the objects that the player picked up.

157939.Name: Mr. Hat and the Magic Cube
157939.Overview:
Join Mr Hat and his friends in a wonderful adventure to reunite the stolen pieces of his cube and get back home. 

Along the way your child will learn the basics in: vocabulary, spelling, counting, memory, and coordination. All introduced with beautiful graphics, animations and videos that will keep you child (and you) entertained for hours! 

Featuring 
- 5 different learning zones, teaching the basics in vocabulary, spelling, counting, memory, and coordination. 
- Progressive learning curve to retain captivation 
- Beautiful 3d graphics, animations and videos to maximise engagement 
- Designed by experts in child behavior

157940.Name: Route 66
157940.Overview:
"Mad" Madeleine Mayflower is a professional biker that, after competing for more than twenty years, decides to take a break from the race circuit, traveling with her motorcycle to explore the historical route 66 alongside her grandfather.

Route 66 is a straightforward hidden object game, where the objective is to find all the items from a list at the bottom of the screen, on picturesque locations around the United States filled with assorted paraphernalia. The hint button is a badge at the bottom-right, that shows the position of one of the required objects when activated.

Three mini-games appear between each location, giving extra hints to the player when completed. They are implementations of classic games like Simon with checkers pieces, a matching game with bottle taps and Reversi/Othello.

157941.Name: Rocks N' Rockets
157941.Overview:
Thousands of meteors are heading towards earth! Are you ready to take the hero's seat in this mesmerizing arcade game?

Are you ready to take the hero's seat in this mesmerizing arcade game? We hope so. Civilization is threatened by a terrifying, multi-phased meteor attack—thousands of strange meteors are heading towards Earth! Your mission is to protect our cities by controlling a rocket launcher that is built to protect each city.

Features

• Waves of increasingly destructive meteors

• Innovative power ups

• Over 100 exciting levels

157942.Name: Reef Aquarium
157942.Overview: Download the magnificent coral reefs of the deep blue to your console. Feel the atmosphere of the underwater world and watch its inhabitants swimming around you. You will see the most vivid ocean fishes there. Fish library will help you to find out more about these amazing creatures. And do not forget to feed fish and play with them – fish are very easy to get upset.

157943.Name: Metara
157943.Overview:
Use your ship to build towers, defend your base and push the enemy back.

Your ship got three different stances, four types of weapons and the ability to build turrets.

Use these functions to conquer the variety of levels.

The game contains different in-game objectives for each level, spread out on four different planets.

Your main objective is to push the enemy back and defend the planet you are on through different hazardous stages.

157944.Name: MENA Speed
157944.Overview:
Are you the MENA Speed champion? Customize and upgrade your car then accept challenges across different terrains. MENA Speed is the first drag race game with tracks in major cities across the Middle East, pumping up your adrenaline with screeching tires and burned rubber across the roads of Dubai, Amman, Kuwait and Cairo. 

Enjoy the different power-ups by upgrading your car engine, gearbox, cooling system, and manifold to improve your car’s performance; and customize its look with different paint jobs, spoilers and rims; all with a wide range of options.

157945.Name: Left to Die in Zombhai
157945.Overview: Welcome to Zombhai, a city populated by zombies! What will it take you to survive? Featuring a wide range of weapons and locations this game will bring hours of fun.

157946.Name: Paper Wars: Cannon Fodder
157946.Overview: Paper Wars Cannon Fodder is a tower defense video game developed by several Polish and Hungarian outsourced programmers of iFun4all team, in the cheapest way you can imagine. What’s the so-called brilliant goal of the game? You would never guess. It is about destroying all enemies! The same well-known thrilling story, hordes of cold-blooded enemies trying to survive the Armageddon! There are some additional goals to be achieved in different missions and levels - watch your right! The game can be played by up to four players in co-op mode. If you think you need some extraordinary power-ups, you can get them during three campaigns: Classic, Winter Assault and Cyber Wars. „Hand made” graphics, soviet style military music and annoying sound effects make players eager to complete each level and collect medals for their outstanding efforts.

157947.Name: Panda Craze
157947.Overview:
Dig, drill, and blast your way through ice and rock in this epic puzzle adventure!

Guide Tik-Ling the panda through caves, forests, mountains, and deserts on the way to her home, the bamboo forest. The concept is simple: collect all of the magical lanterns in each level to unlock a magic portal to the next level. Actually getting to the lanterns without getting stuck in the process, however, is not so simple! Dig, drill, and blast your way through ice and rock in this epic puzzle adventure!

157948.Name: Nom Nation
157948.Overview:
Nom Nation is a delicious platform adventure.

You play as Chef on a mission to rescue the Book of Nom from Jabber the Gut, head of the McFatass Corporation. Only the Noms can help you succeed. Harnessing their hidden powers is the key ingredient. 

- 11 levels
- 5 nutritious worlds
- A multitude of fun power-ups

Take farting to a whole new level!

157949.Name: Ninjamurai
157949.Overview: Takezou Nishimura is the offspring of a Ninja and Samurai and in his world he is seen as an aberration. He is known as "The Ninjamurai." Takezou must journey throughout the lands seeking out members of the evil Black Armor Corporation who are responsible for atrocities against his family and clan. Ninjamurai is an action platformer that contains over 20 levels, huge boss fights, various modes and difficulties, unlockable costumes and extra awards and statistics.

157950.Name: Monochrome Racing
157950.Overview:
Screeching tires, the smell of burned rubber, the rush of adrenaline and enemies that are left in the dust-these are the emotions that drive real racers. However there is much more than this in the world of Monochrome Racing-there is the passion for color! Color is everything here, it is what you strive for, in the world where everything is in black and white. Color is your fuel, color gives you speed, color makes you stronger and ultimately makes you the true leader of the monochrome racing world.

- More than 80 tracks to complete
- More than 10 cars to choose from and upgrade
- Numerous power ups and bonuses that makes your vehicle stronger and your enemies weaker
- Mysterious monochrome world to immerse

157951.Name: Karoshi
157951.Overview:
Karoshi has been played by millions to date to high acclaim.

We've been taught we need to survive. We need to reach the end, save the princess and be the hero. 

That's all well and good, but it's getting boring. Who says it has to be this way?

Mr Karoshi is an overworked Japanese salary man who’s had enough and his only goal is to end it all. You control him to work through the fast logic puzzles trying to find hilarious ways to his demise in this highly original puzzle platformer with a twist.
It’s not as easy as it sounds!! You need to think cleverly and sometimes ‘outside the box’ to find a solution. 

So forget everything you know so far! Join the millions of people already playing Karoshi and download it on your PSP™ today!

Features:
•	50 unique levels
•	Dark Humour
•	Collect all the coins
•	Catchy soundtrack by Jake Almond

157952.Name: Kaleidoscope: Interactive Synaesthesia Project
157952.Overview: Kaleidoscope consists of level-paintings, which differ in style and behavior, yet are controlled in a similar fashion with the help of just four buttons. The simplicity of the controls is overcompensated by the rich audio/visual experience presented within the game. Player’s responses to a constantly changing environment shall have an impact on both image and audio. This creates an illusion of a player being simultaneously a painter of the current image and a composer of the music heard. In addition to that, each level in Kaleidoscope has a clear defined goal, which opens up doors of an infinite synaesthesia world to the masses.

157953.Name: L.A. Gridlock
157953.Overview:
Los Angeles is under siege from gangs roaming in vehicles. They attack ordinary citizens mercilessly. The city’s Mayor appoints you the City Police Chief. Your brief is to eliminate the thugs and regain control of your city. You will direct and control the forces at your disposal to outwit the enemy. Your mission is to direct car chases in hot pursuit of the criminals using all resources available to you. 

Car chases across the streets of Los Angeles! Place police vehicles on the roads of L.A. in order to hunt down the thugs before they escape. Zoom in to watch car chases unfold along the famous streets of L.A. 

An action game of strategy and car chases with:
•	4 Famous L.A. locations!
•	8 Levels of play!
•	17 Cars & bikes to play with!
•	60+ Waves of thugs to defeat!
•	100s of exploding vehicles!

157955.Name: greenTech+
157955.Overview:
greenTech+ is a commercial version of the freeware game greenTech. Just like in the original game the player controls a hurricane in an attempt to steer polluted clouds into cleansing factories, to create cleaner air and thwart global warming. Polluted clouds are sent out gradually and these are drawn towards the hurricane that can move about freely on the screen. By moving the hurricane and keeping track of all pollution, the clouds need to be steered into the factories. Borrowing from the mechanics of Tower Defense games, the pollution needs to be moved away from high pressure zones. These zones immediately absorb the pollution and disperse it, adding 10% to the global warming percentage. Similarly, having pollution touch the hurricane yields a 20% percentage. When 100% is reached, Earth is destroyed and the game is over.

The game consists of 30 levels that are unlocked in six tiers, along with a tutorial. New tiers become available by collecting perfect clear ribbons; clearing stages with 0% percentage. The game has a retro look and all levels are played in single, non-scrolling screens. In later levels multiple pollution appears at once and it often needs to be guided through small passages. Two additional keys allow the player to speed up or speed down the pollution, but this does not affect the entire game time. By completing levels players unlock monitors that give the game a different look. The game also supports anaglyph 3D.

Compared to the mechanics of the first game, the hurricane is no longer restricted to a grid and can be moved around freely at a much faster pace compared to the mouse-based controls in the original game.

157957.Name: Galcon Labs
157957.Overview:
Conquer the Galaxy like never before! Galcon Labs is an awesome high-paced galactic arcade-strategy game. Send swarms of ships to defeat enemy planets and conquer the universe! 

Exclusively designed for PlayStation®Minis campaign mode to unlock the four innovative new game modes to you:

Billiards: 'Moving Planets' - need we say more? With a constantly changing battlefield this game never has a dull moment. 

Stealth: Enemy ships become invisible, changing Galcon into a game of inter-galactic hide and seek! 

Crash: Ships battle in mid-flight, bringing a whole different twist to the classic gameplay. You can now defeat the enemy in the air! 

Assassin: Each opponent is assigned a target. The first player to annihilate their target wins the round! 

Galcon Labs: Conquer the galaxy in five minutes!

157959.Name: I Kill Zombies
157959.Overview: Its time to maim and murder your way to the top of an exiting new game show! I Kill Zombies see's you trapped inside a giant arena fending off the forces of the undead as one of three characters. Do you have what it takes to survive? Who kills zombies? I Kill Zombies!!!

157967.Name: Basha Trix
157967.Overview: Play through four exciting kingdoms of trix on the minis platform. This 4-player game puts the player in an atmosphere of playing with old friends, with rich arabesque visuals that stem from traditional game boards and tables from the Arabian region. The realistic gameplay is further enhanced by a relaxing soundtrack, and all in all provides for hours of endless fun!

160659.Name: Search and Rescue
160659.Overview: The government sends down an investigation team to a crashed spaceship that had vanished off its course, in order to determine what actually happened… Infiltrate the spaceship, and battle hordes of alien monsters and robots, in this action-shooting masterpiece of SNK originally released in 1989.

164070.Name: Hotel Mogul
164070.Overview:
Lynette's conniving husband has cheated her out of her family business! What can an enterprising young woman like her do? Get revenge! Use your business savvy to help Lynette repurchase her company and send her husband to the slammer.

Buy, develop and sell commercial properties to make a profit build attractions that increase your income and keep your eye on the bottom line as you purchase materials and hire workers. The fun of Hotel Mogul will have you laughing all the way to the bank!

164504.Name: One Epic Game
164504.Overview:
One Epic Game is an Infinity Runner video game developed by Czech company Grip Games. The game was released in 2011 for PlayStation 3, PlayStation Vita, PlayStation Portable, IOS and Android. The game is parody for multiple video game and movie clichés.

The player controls an infinity running character. He can only jump or shoot. Jumping helps him avoid obstacles and traps while shooting kills enemies. Player can also kill enemies by jumping on their heads. There are multiple game modes in game. The main is story mode. There are missions with consistent story. There is a task in every mission (for example getting through 1000 metres, getting to finish with only one life or kill certain numbers of enemies). Every mission is set in one of five worlds - Zombie Outbreak, Nuclear Wasteland, World War II, Alien Invasion and Fantasy Kingdom. Story is told by comix scenes.

Another mode is Free Run. In this mode layer chooses a World and then tries to make the highest possible score. 

The last mode is Challenges. Player chooses his task there and then he tries to fulfil it. He can also choose difficulty. For the lowest difficulty he gains bronze medal while for the hardest he gains gold medal. 

There are multiple weapons in game. Player starts with Pistol. He can also take another weapon on his way, for example Shotgun, Machine gun, Rocket launcher, Flamethrower or Laser. Every weapon behaves differently. When a player is hurt he loses his gained weapon and has to fight with a pistol again. Player can always carry only one weapon. Player can also take Heart, that gives him life, or jetpack, that allows him to fly. There is a checkpoint at every 1000 metres.

164505.Name: Sky Force
164505.Overview:
Sky Force is a vertically scrolling shoot 'em up video game series created by the Polish video game developer Infinite Dreams Inc.. The gameplay is reminiscent of Capcom's 19XX series and Seibu Kaihatsu's Raiden series, featuring a weapon upgrade system and large end of stage bosses.

Sky Force Reloaded:

The second outing was initially released for Symbian, Pocket PC and Palm webOS in 2006 and was later released for iOS (2009), Iphone ios 7 (2010) and PSP (2011). The PSP version of "Sky Force Reloaded" was simply named "Sky Force". The 2D graphics style of the first title was combined with some 3D polygon objects like destructible towers. It received a remake for mobile in 2016, with a PC, PlayStation 4, and Xbox One versions released in 2017, and also a Nintendo Switch version released in 2018.

165956.Name: Future Fight
165956.Overview:
Future Fight is tactic battle game in which all sides are performing their turns at the same time for true battle mayhem!

It is only tactic game in which you can reverse time to surprise your enemies! You can also try to bribe enemy units to leave from the battle.

Game utilizes extremely simple point & shoot interface so you can focus only on managing your army and lead it to glorious victory!

Game contains:

– 3 classes of units
– 6 unique units’ skills
– 30 medals to collect and 9 military ranks to achieve
– flexible upgrade system
– quick fight mode
– hot seat multiplayer mode
– operations mode where you can manage your armies
– step-by-step tutorial for easy introduction
– tactic guide for improving your achievements
– 10 operations that offers

169454.Name: Gang Wars
169454.Overview:
Gang Wars is a 2D side-scrolling beat 'em-up game that puts players in the shoes of either Mike (player 1) or Jackie (player 2). In 1989 a girl gets kidnapped in New York and now you have to fight through hordes of gang members to rescue her.

Before starting you have to choose your fighter type. Power, speed, stamina or standard type. The first three types let you excel in either power, speed or guard. Its gives you five distribution point at one of these disciplines and two each at the remaining. The standard type starts with all disciplines at three points. Completing a stage earns you more points that can be distribution among the three disciplines as you choose. You fight various different gangsters and bosses with city scenery on the background. Object dropped by opponents like rocks, guns and baseball bats can be picked up and used to assault the enemies. The game can be played solo or with a friend.

169459.Name: Guerilla War
169459.Overview: Enter the jungle and ruined cities of a tropical island to overthrow its tyrannical dictator, and liberate the nation held in his grip. Don't forget to rescue your captured comrades along the way! Hail the heroes of the Revolution!!

169460.Name: HAL 21
169460.Overview: As Captain Clain, attack enemies in the air and bomb ground targets on your way to the boss in this classic shooting title originally released in 1985.

169461.Name: Ikari III: The Rescue
169461.Overview: The presidential candidate's daughter has been kidnapped! It is your job to get past enemy lines and rescue her. This is the third game in the Ikari Warriors series, and features similar arcade/action gameplay. The screen is a top down view which scrolls vertically, with numerous bad guys to defeat. You start the game with just your fists, and as the levels progress you can find weapons and other objects to help you out.

169463.Name: Ozma Wars
169463.Overview: Fight against UFOs, meteors, comets, and dock with the mothership before your energy runs out in SNK's first arcade game originally released in 1979. Ozma Wars stands out as the second released vertical shooting arcade game, but is also known as the first game with disparate levels!

169464.Name: P.O.W.: Prisoners of War
169464.Overview:
The enemy is unstoppable. They maintain vigilant guard over their front lines! The only way to defeat them is to get behind their lines. But how? By allowing a soldier to get captured, perhaps he could escape and single-handedly defeat the enemy forces in his way.

In P.O.W., the player is a soldier who has been imprisoned in a Prisoner of War camp and must escape. In order to accomplish this, he must defeat a variety of enemies. The foes will attack you hand-to-hand, with knives, guns, and from helicopters. Boss enemies will guard the end of each level.

To fight back, you can use hand-to-hand, and pick up weapon power-ups, found on the ground, in rooms, or dropped by enemies. These weapons include a knife, which can be used to stab or be thrown, guns and grenades.

169466.Name: Prehistoric Isle
169466.Overview: Pilot an 1930's airplane, and fight against legions of dinosaurs and cavemen over a tropical island filled with mystery and danger! While collecting Speed Up & Power Up items, beware of the numerous traps that await you in this horizontal side-scrolling shooter released by SNK in 1989!

169469.Name: Psycho Soldier
169469.Overview: Sequel to ATHENA, and first appearance of the young psychic powered "Idol" schoolgirl Athena Asamiya! Get rid of the monsters from her hometown using her Psycho Powers! PSYCHO SOLDIER (originally released in 1987) is also noteworthy for being the first arcade game to utilize a vocal track during gameplay!

169471.Name: Sasuke vs Commander
169471.Overview:
Sasuke is given a single command from his lord: defend him from ninjas. Several thousand ninjas, specifically.

Sasuke can run along the bottom of the screen while ninjas fly across the screen diagonally, dropping shuriken. Sasuke's thrown kunai destroy shuriken and kill ninjas, but falling ninja will block any kunai that hit them. After finishing two waves a Magic Bonus ninja will appear. Magic Bonus ninjas have special abilities, such as rapidly teleporting around the screen or shooting fire, and will award more bonus points the faster they are hit.

169473.Name: Labyrinth
169473.Overview: In this game the carnivorous plants have been let out! To escape from their insatiable appetite, you must devour all the seeds in the labyrinth, trick them, change direction, accelerate, go down the secret passages and eat up all the magic fruit to increase your strength and become the new predator of the labyrinth.

169475.Name: Music Quiz
169475.Overview: Do you have an ear for music? Music Quiz is a new type of quiz game where your ears are all you've got to rely on to win. Listen carefully to the musical notes and instruments being played and be the first to choose the right one. Enjoy beating your best score in the certification mode or besting a friend in versus play.

169476.Name: Vanguard
169476.Overview: VANGUARD, famous for being one of the first scrolling shooters ever made, was originally released in 1981. Shoot your enemies in all four directions or get an energy pod and ram them in this classic arcade game!

169477.Name: Shogi
169477.Overview:
Looking for a little board game fun? Try your hand at Shogi, a Japanese game that is similar to chess, but has an important strategic difference: game pieces you eliminate become yours to control. Do you have what it takes to capture your opponents King and become a Shogi champion?

Recommended for one or two players and playable using a single PSP® system.

169478.Name: Sneezies
169478.Overview:
Sneezies is an overload of cuteness! Grab a cup of coffee, sit back in your favorite plush chair, and enjoy the soothing relaxed gameplay featuring fantastic graphics and sweet melodies. Touch the screen to drop a burst of sneezing powder into the field of floating Sneezies and watch as they sneeze themselves out of their bubbles in a marvelous chain reaction. Try to rescue as many Sneezies as you can in one go.

Sneezies features beautiful graphics, varied backgrounds, hilarious sound effects, and relaxed, soothing background music. Play through 45 relaxing levels of Sneezies in the Classic Mode, or unleash your skills in the 15 Challenge Mode levels. Post your high scores online for free, right from the game, and see how you stack up against other Sneezies players around the world.

169479.Name: Spaceball: Revolution
169479.Overview: "Spaceball: Revolution" will put your intelligence and skill to the test as you solve puzzles in a futuristic environment, You have to copy the figures that appear on the top screen, using energy balls that make the boxes used to construct the figure correctly change color. But it won't be an easy task... Different obstacles will be thrown into your path, making you polish your aim and think rapidly. Fifteen different levels are waiting for you in "Spaceball: Revolution" - Are you up to the challenge? Only the very best players manage to reach the end!

169480.Name: Stellar Attack
169480.Overview:
Stellar Attack expertly blends old-school deep space shoot-em-up action with classic puzzle gameplay. Use your skill and reflexes to destroy chains of colored orbs and deadly gun turrets.

Eliminate orbs with your colored lasers to expose the turrets and blow them out of orbit, but avoid the homing missiles and cannon fire that threaten your fragile ship. One missed laser could break your combo in this classic score-chasing action-puzzle game!

169482.Name: T.N.K. III
169482.Overview: Play as Colonel Ralf, manuevering your tank and firing its machine guns and cannon. Destroy the enemy army in this arcade classic originally released in 1985, featuring revolutionary controls for its time!

169483.Name: Pallurikio
169483.Overview:
Jump and roll with Pallurikio, a fast-paced action platformer, easy to pick up, yet challenging to master.
While playing a mysterious board game he found with his friends, Rusty is sucked up in a dimensional vortex and finds himself cast into a mystical and wondrous world, where he assumes the aspect of the round and bouncing Pallurikio.
Make Pallurikio jump and roll, and help him find his way through more than 50 enticing levels, while surviving all kinds of pitfalls and trickeries he might come across when traversing Bakumbala Jungle, the far reaches of Palluro Prime and many other environments. Featuring physics simulation, Time Attack mode, collectable cards, and space rockets, Pallurikio is a game on which you won’t want to miss out!

169484.Name: Time Soldiers
169484.Overview: Travel through historical eras such as "The Primitive Age", "The Age of Rome", "The World Wars", "The Age of Wars", and "The Future World" in order to rescue your fellow comrades in this top-down action shooter released by SNK in 1987.

169485.Name: Tonzurakko
169485.Overview: Help your sea otter swim toward victory as you evade hungry killer whales and water hazards galore! As you splash your way toward your goal you will be challenged by dizzying whirlpools, deadly frozen icebergs and sea creatures looking to make you their next meal. But, snag shellfishes and use them as either turbo speed boosts or as projectiles to keep your sea faring foes at bay.

169486.Name: Touchdown Fever
169486.Overview: Choose from a wide variety of 100 formations & plays, and challenge the best teams in this American Football game originally released by SNK in 1987.

169487.Name: Velocity
169487.Overview: In 2211 the distant star Vilio exploded into a red giant, sending an electromagnetic pulse surging into our deep space mining ships, colony cruisers and Special Forces fighters. Now the star is beginning to collapse into a black hole, pulling our stranded fleets to their doom. To make things worse, our warring neighbors have deployed scavengers to prey upon our people. Only one craft is capable of a rescue mission, the Quarp Jet - a spacecraft capable of teleportation. Take control of the world’s first quantum teleport craft in this innovative shooter, using a range of teleport controls to outsmart enemies, solve action puzzles and rescue survivors from their deep space hideaways. Featuring genre-busting game play and music from Joris de Man (Killzone), Velocity plays like a dream and sounds incredible!

169488.Name: Who's That Flying?!
169488.Overview:
As the mysterious and powerful "Guardian of Earth" your steely eye and HYPER-POWERED LASER ARM have kept the citizens of Earth safe for generations (as well as proving a hit with the ladies).

With all your awesome TALENT and FLAIR, surely it would be IMPOSSIBLE for a devastating invasion of Doom Beasts to descend on your cities and cause havoc without your knowledge? (Even if you were MAYBE showboating for a magazine photo-shoot at the time...)

Now, you must not only defend your cities from the ravenous hordes of Doom Beasts - you must defend yourself against accusations of gross incompetence from the Galactic Council of Justice! And this is all BEFORE you can even start to get to the bottom of just who OR what is really behind the attacks...

• Story mode featuring 15 levels over 5 unique stages
• 11 enemy types
• 5 gigantic boss battles
• 4 Infinite Mode Stages
• 24 Challenge Mode Stages
• 14 Bonus Magazine articles to unlock
• 12 Glittering Awards to discover
• 6 Dramatic Courtroom cutscenes

173060.Name: Fortix
173060.Overview:
Fortix is a Qix variant with a medieval fantasy theme. The game takes places in the land of Fortiana where the reign of evil forces have turned the place into a desolate wasteland. The player takes control of the heir of the late king, Knight Fortix in his attempt to reclaim the land from the dark ruler.

The kingdom consists of twelve shires, each a level in the game. Each level has one or several enemy buildings and the goal is to conquer all of them. As in Qix the player can move around the borders of the playfield safely. By moving inwards and leaving the base line the player draws lines. This makes him vulnerable towards the enemies. By connecting his line with the base line the player can conquer land. Any enemy that is encircled will be killed. The monsters of Fortix are different kinds of dragons with different capabilities. The player also has to watch out for towers that shoot pellets whenever the player leaves the base line. These can be taken out with the use of catapults. These are triggered when the player encircles an halberd icon. There is one catapult for each tower on the map. Towers can also be taken out by conquering the land they are on.

There is different kinds of terrain in the game which impacts the movement speed of the player. Walking on grass is fast while water and swamps are slower to traverse. There is also walls that the player can't move through and has to find a way around. The player will find power ups scattered around the levels which he can pick up by encircling them. These can do many things from increasing the player's speed to freezing the monsters for a short time.

173539.Name: Sudoku
173539.Overview: Sudoku allows the player to play Sudoku on his console or handheld. Like in other Sudoku games the goal is to fill a 9 by 9 grid with the number one through nine. Each numbers has to be placed in the right spot on a grid, where each line and section can only contain each number only once.

178983.Name: 3 2 1... Supercrash!
178983.Overview:
3,2,1...SuperCrash! is the follow up to StormBasic's earlier game Crash!! The most stupid race. Players take control of a man riding on a unicycle. The unicycle can be moved right and left and can be made to jump while the man himself can only move his arms. Each of the man's arms can be moved independently of each other. The arm's can be held out stretched to the center or be bent either up or down. The main goal of the game is to get through various obstacle courses. The main obstacles are walls cut out with human shaped figures. The player has to make the man match the pose of these holes in the wall in order to get through them without crashing. Other obstacles include things such as barriers which need to be jumped over, cows, mud slicks (impedes the player's view of the play area), and even flying saucers. There are also stars scattered around the obstacle course which earn the player more points when they are collected.

The game is broken into two game modes. Tour mode lets the player compete at five different venues. Endless mode features five different obstacle course types which include Score Attack, Classic, Dodge, Turbo, and Mirror Effects.

179008.Name: Rasmus Klump and the Big Maze
179008.Overview: Rasmus Klump and his friends have gone on an adventure in the moles' underground passages. The friends have gone missing in the maze and you control Rasmus, who has to find his missing friends. On the way, you can also find other different items, which have been lost in the maze.

179440.Name: Age of Zombies
179440.Overview:
The evil Professor Brains has sent hordes of zombies back to various periods in history to destroy mankind. Its up to time traveling protagonist Barry Steakfries to foil this evil scheme.

Age of Zombies is a top-down shooter that will take the player to the prehistory, thirties Chicago, ancient Egypt, medieval Japan and the future. To defend himself against large waves of zombies, Barry can use his standard gun, for which he receives no points, or various other weapons like SMGs, flamethrowers, shotguns, miniguns and explosives which can be found around the map.

179563.Name: Arcade Essentials
179563.Overview:
Try your hand at five classic arcade games with a modern twist.
Master space shooters and arcade puzzles inspired by retro 80s classics.
Unlock new levels and show off your skills on the high score tables.

179811.Name: Rasmus Klump in Pingonesien
179811.Overview: Rasmus Klump in Pingonesien is a Edutainment/Miscellaneous/Puzzle video game published by Nordisk Film Games Publishing released on May 30, 2012 for the PlayStation Portable.

179812.Name: Rasmus Klump is saving the Chickens
179812.Overview: Rasmus Klump is Saving the Chickens is a Edutainment/Miscellaneous/Puzzle video game published by Nordisk Film Games Publishing released on February 18, 2012 for the PlayStation Portable.

179895.Name: Piyotama
179895.Overview:
Piyotama is a downloadable puzzle game available exclusively for the PlayStation 3 and the PlayStation Portable on the PlayStation Store.

The game's goal is to manipulate colored eggs and line up four or more in a row to "hatch" them. The eggs can only be manipulated when outside of the "nest" (the play area), which is accomplished by sliding the selected row of eggs to the left or right using the dpad. The order of the three eggs pushed out of the nest can be cycled left or right using the X and O buttons, respectively. The current row can be changed with the up and down directions on the dpad allowing them to be re-inserted on a different row to form lines of matching eggs.

Once a line of four eggs is formed a "hatch" is begun, giving the player a short time to create more lines of eggs to form a combo to score more points before the eggs hatch. When the "hatch" timer is up any eggs that formed part of a line will hatch and the little Piyos will fly off to collect on either side of the screen. An egg will hatch even if it is no longer part of a line of matching eggs, so long as it is not being held outside of the nest. The remaining eggs will fall to fill in the gaps. When enough points are scored the player's level increases.

189513.Name: Ballpen Koujou 2
189513.Overview: Ball Pen Koujou 2 is a puzzle game in which you place caps back on ballpoint pens.

189656.Name: Demo Koushin
189656.Overview: Demo Koushin can be seen as a distant relative of Pac-Man. The player is a little man running around and collecting the other men also running around the houses. The goal is to bring the men back to the starting point underneath a huge scoreboard while avoiding the demonstrators walking around; if they catch you you'll lose a life
